name: Forever Night
description:
Game "Forever Night" is an action adventure game with a great and atmospheric storyline and open world. The game will give you an unforgettable experience.
Plot:
The sun disappeared in Donoharp. The main character will need to find out what happened to it. Peculiar properties:
- Great story.
- Rich open world: Gastronome Gallery Night club Bar School Casino And much more
- Simple controls
- Quality soundtrack
- Mini-games in the open world
- Secrets and Easter eggs
All this and much more in the game "Forever Night"
